x = (72^2 + 2*72*√72 + 8*72 + 16) / (72 + 4*√72 + 4)
  = (5184 + 1224 + 576 + 16) / (72 + 33.9 + 4)
  = 7000 / 109.9
  = 63.69
So the correct range for x when 36 ≤ n ≤ 72 is:
31.75 < x < 63.69

   x = (36^2 + 2*√36*(36+4) + 16) / (36 + 4*√36 + 4)

     = (5184 + 1289.76 + 16) / 109.941
     = 6489.76 / 109.941
